00047     IOHandlerData(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp)
00048       : IOHandler(sd, addr, dhp), m_send_queue() {
00049       m_connected = false;
00050       reset_incoming_message_state();
00051     }
00052 
00053     void reset_incoming_message_state() {
00054       m_got_header = false;
00055       m_event = new Event(Event::MESSAGE, m_addr);
00056       m_message_header_ptr = m_message_header;
00057       m_message_header_remaining = m_event->header.fixed_length();
00058       m_message = 0;
00059       m_message_ptr = 0;
00060       m_message_remaining = 0;
00061     }
